translation.Name: Buak_Note_19
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: During our first experiment yesterday, we experienced a critical failure. She went through the first few phases perfectly fine, but all of a sudden something went wrong, and... Rainer, Alexandra, Hannah, Elliot, Hailey all died. We need to be more careful to not create another mutation anomaly. But, with that said, our glass is half full. Maybe this happened for the best and we can learn from it. I wonder if it can feel pain, feel hurt…If it can die. If the answer to any of these questions is ‘no’, and we decisively conclude that, we’re on the right path.
